[^1]: Spatial layers downloaded from [OpenStreetMap®](https://www.openstreetmap.org/#map=4/-40.44/-63.59) and [Plataforma Abierta de Datos Espaciales de la Argentina (POBLACIONES)](https://poblaciones.org/category/cartografias/); marker icons from [Freepik](https://www.freepik.com/).

[^2]: Layers from POBLACIONES were read and processed using the [xlsx2geojson](https://github.com/Issengard83/xlsx2geojson) R package, developed by Dr. Tamara Ricardo

```{r}
#| echo: false
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = F, 
                      message = F, 
                      warning = F,
                      fig.align = "center", 
                      dpi = 300)
## Load packages
pacman::p_load(
  sf, 
  tmap,
  tmaptools,
  maptiles,
  spdep,
  scico,
  rio,
  janitor,
  tidyverse
  )

## Define color palette
pal <- scico(n = 6, palette = "lipari",
                              direction = -1, alpha = .9)
```

```{r}
### Load spatial layers
# Socioeconomic indicators
var_ct <- st_read("gis/strata_ct.geojson", quiet = T)

# IMUSA location
imu_loc <- st_read("gis/IMUSA_loc.geojson", quiet = T)

# Administrative districts
adm_dis <- st_read("gis/adm_dis.geojson", quiet = T)

# Sampled points
imu_shp <- st_read("gis/IMUSA_points.geojson", quiet = T)

# Informal settlements
inf_shp <- st_read("gis/inf_shp.geojson", quiet = T)
```

```{r}
### Aggregate seropositives by census tract
imu_p_ct <- imu_shp |> 
  # add census tract
  st_join(adm_dis |> select(adm_dis), 
          join = st_nearest_feature) |> 
  
  # MAT results as numeric
  mutate(MAT_res = if_else(MAT_res == "POS", 1, 0)) |> 
  
  # aggregate
  group_by(across(.cols = c(census_tract, adm_dis, households, 
                            starts_with("hh_")))) |> 
  
  summarise(sampled = n(),
            POS = sum(MAT_res, na.rm = T)) |> 
  
  ungroup() |> 
  
  # validate
   st_cast(to = "POINT") |> 
  st_make_valid()

```

```{r}
#| echo: false
## Create spatial polygons
imu_poly_ct <- var_ct |> 
  
  inner_join(imu_p_ct |> 
               st_drop_geometry() |> 
               select(census_tract, sampled, POS)) |> 
  
  # Replace missing values with 0
  mutate(across(.cols = c("sampled", "POS"), .fns = ~ replace_na(.x, 0)))
  
## Nearest neighbor analysis
nb <- st_centroid(imu_poly_ct) |> 
  knearneigh(k = 3) |> 
  knn2nb()

# Neighbors matrix
nbw <- nb2listw(nb, style = "W")

## Local Moran's I
lmoran <- localmoran(imu_poly_ct$POS, 
                     listw = nbw, 
                     alternative = "two.sided")

## Identify clusters
mp <- imu_poly_ct$POS |> 
  scale() |>  
  as.vector() |>  
  moran.plot(nbw, plot = F) 

## Add Moran's data to shapefile
imu_poly_Ii <- imu_poly_ct |> 
  # Local Moran's I
  bind_cols(lmoran) |> 
  
  # Cluster data
  bind_cols(mp |> select(x, wx)) |> 
  
  # Clean variable names
  rename(lmp = "Pr(z != E(Ii))") |> 
  
  # Create new variables
  mutate(
    # Categorized Z-score
    Zii_cat = cut(Z.Ii, breaks = c(-Inf, -1.96, 1.96, Inf),
                  labels = c("Negative SAC", "No SAC", "Positive SAC")),
    # Cluster quadrants
    quadrant = case_when(
      (x>=0 & wx>=0) & lmp<=.05 ~ "High-High",
      (x<=0 & wx<=0) & lmp<=.05 ~ "Low-Low",
      (x>=0 & wx<=0) & lmp<=.05 ~ "High-Low",
      (x<=0 & wx>=0) & lmp<=.05 ~ "Low-High",
      lmp>.05 ~ "Non-significant")
  )

### Clean working environment
rm(list = setdiff(ls(), c("var_ct", "imu_poly_Ii", "imu_p_ct", "inf_shp", "imu_loc", "pal")))
```

```{r}
### Generate map
map <-
  # base map
  tm_basemap(server = "OpenStreetMap") +
  
  # socioeconomic indicators
  tm_shape(shp = var_ct) +
  tm_polygons(col = c("hh_nbi","hh_no_tap_water","hh_no_sewage",
                      "hh_garbage_collection","hh_paved_roads"),
              palette = pal,
              border.alpha = .25,
              popup.vars = F) +
  tm_facets(as.layers = T, 
            free.scales.fill = T) +
  
  # incidence of chronic poverty
  tm_shape(shp = var_ct) +
  tm_polygons(col = "hh_chronic_poverty_cat",
              palette = pal,
              border.alpha = .25,
              title = "Incidence of chronic poverty",
              group = "chronic poverty",
              popup.vars = c("census tract" = "census_tract",                                          "households",
                             "hh_nbi",
                             "hh_overcrowding",
                             "hh_no_tap_water",
                             "hh_no_sewage",
                             "hh_pit_cesspool",
                             "hh_garbage_collection",
                             "hh_paved_roads",
                             "socioeconomic_strata")) +

  # Spatial clusters
  tm_shape(shp = imu_poly_Ii) +
  tm_polygons(col = "quadrant",
              style = "pretty",
              alpha = .9,
              palette = scico(n = 5, palette = "acton", direction = 1),
              title = "Spatial clusters",
              popup.vars = c("Local Moran's I" = "Ii",
                             "Spatial autocorrelation" = "Zii_cat",
                             "quadrant",
                             "Seropositive animals" = "POS"),
              id = "census_tract",
              group = "clusters") +
  
## Add number of seropositive animals per census tract
tm_shape(shp = imu_p_ct) +
tm_bubbles(size = "POS",
           col = "#FC8D62",
           alpha = .8,
           style = "cat",
           group = "seropositives") +
  
  ## Informal settlements and slums
  tm_shape(shp = inf_shp) +
  tm_fill(col = "#B32F9C",
          alpha = .9,
          group = "slums") +

  ## Plot IMUSA locations
  tm_shape(shp = imu_loc) +
  tm_markers(border.col = "white",
             border.lwd = 0,
             icon.scale = 1.1,
             popup.vars = F,
             id = "type",
             group = "markers")
```

```{r}
## Display interactive map
tmap_mode("view")
map %>% 
  tmap_leaflet() |> 
  leaflet::hideGroup(group = c("hh_nbi","hh_no_tap_water","hh_no_sewage",
                      "hh_garbage_collection","hh_paved_roads",
                      "clusters", "seropositives"))
```
